section.heading: Issuance of LGBTQ Pride motor vehicle identification tags.

para.text: The Mayor shall design and make available for issue one or more LGBTQ Pride motor vehicle identification tags demonstrating support for the LGBTQ community.

A resident ordering an LGBTQ Pride motor vehicle identification tag shall pay a one-time application fee and a display fee each year thereafter. The application fee shall be $25, and the display fee shall be $20, or such other amount as may be established by the Mayor by rule.
The application fee and annual display fee shall be deposited into the Office of Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, and Questioning Affairs Fund, established by § 2-1385.
